ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course offered an examination of how objects function in religious contexts, and how their purpose affected their form, and vice versa. I would recommend this course to anyone interested in the relationship between art and ritual. Overall a great class.
It is a great class. You will learn much and read a lot of interesting material. I would definitely recommend taking this class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Very useful for thinking through the relationship between art, text, and religious ritual.
This course provided an arena in which I could explore issues around art objects and think about how to approach the study of Indian art as it related to texts that I am interested in studying.
